snippet.title: Light of the Locked World - Version 0.5.0 trailer
snippet.description:
Light of the Locked World is a role-playing game with real-time telegraphed attack combat, persistence, complex NPCs, extensive character customization, local multiplayer with PVP, and a story about foiling a conspiracy that threatens a colonial, developing world.

Get alpha demo on Steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1097560/Light_of_the_Locked_World/

Game by Zuurix
https://zuurix.com/

Music by Bert Cole:
https://www.bitbybitsound.com/

Additional artwork by Aleksas Klimas:
https://twitter.com/TheMangoLizard

© Aivaras Klimas
